name: The Last Human (McLogicmaster69)
description:
WASD - MOVE

SPACE - JUMP

SHIFT - SPRINT

ESC - MENU

In this game, you play as the last human alive. You are guided by an AI as they guide you to prepare for your DNA to be duplicated to ensure humans don't go extinct. You are taken through some basic tests to make sure all your human abilities are refreshed, after all, you have been asleep for hundreds of years. However, there is something fishy going on with the AI...
